snippet: The decline ends a three-day winning streak for the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index.
abstract: Stock market falls back from record levels as investors decide it is better to play it safe.
lead_paragraph: The decline ends a three-day winning streak for the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index.

headline.main: Market Loses Ground as Investors Seek Safety
headline.print_headline: Market Loses Ground as Investors Seek Safety
